title: Pakistan, Malaysian foreign ministers meet in Turkey
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 17 (APP): Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi Thursday held an informal meeting with Malaysian counterpart Hishammuddin Hussein.
The meeting took place on the sidelines of the Antalya Diplomacy Forum being held in Turkey.
Both the foreign ministers exchanged greetings and viewed that the Diplomacy Forum was vital to promote regional connectivity and lauded Turkish government’s efforts in this regard.
